about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: What can you do to reduce road rage?

about.name: What can you do to reduce road rage?

hasPart.assesses: What can you do to reduce road rage? | What can you do to reduce road rage? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: To do your part to prevent road rage, you should follow laws, signs, signals, and pavement markings. Always signal your intention when changing lanes.

suggestedAnswer.text: Always signal your intention when changing lanes.

comment.text: Always signal your intention when changing lanes.

suggestedAnswer.text: Talk on your cell phone while driving.

comment.text: Talk on your cell phone while driving.
Use your horn frequently.

acceptedAnswer.text: Always signal your intention when changing lanes.

comment.text: Always signal your intention when changing lanes.

answerExplanation.text: To do your part to prevent road rage, you should follow laws, signs, signals, and pavement markings. Always signal your intention when changing lanes.

comment.text: What can you do to reduce road rage? | To do your part to prevent road rage, you should follow laws, signs, signals, and pavement markings. Always signal your intention when changing lanes.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: What can you do to reduce road rage? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
educationalAlignment.targetName: What can you do to reduce road rage?

hasPart.name: This sign is used to warn drivers about:

about.name: This sign is used to warn drivers about:

hasPart.assesses: This sign is used to warn drivers about: | This sign is used to warn drivers about: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. They alert you to conditions that are immediately ahead. This sign is used to warn drivers about an upcoming curve to the right.

comment.text: Upcoming intersections.
Road construction.
Road curves ahead.
Road curves ahead.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. They alert you to conditions that are immediately ahead. This sign is used to warn drivers about an upcoming curve to the right.

comment.text: This sign is used to warn drivers about: | Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. They alert you to conditions that are immediately ahead. This sign is used to warn drivers about an upcoming curve to the right.

hasPart.name: It is illegal to park your vehicle:

about.name: It is illegal to park your vehicle:

hasPart.assesses: It is illegal to park your vehicle: | It is illegal to park your vehicle: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It is illegal to park your car on a marked or unmarked crosswalk. You may park in a bicycle lane if there is not a "No parking" sign posted and your vehicle does not block a bicyclist.

comment.text: In an unmarked crosswalk.

suggestedAnswer.text: Within three feet of a private driveway.

comment.text: Within three feet of a private driveway.
In a bicycle lane.
In an unmarked crosswalk.

answerExplanation.text: It is illegal to park your car on a marked or unmarked crosswalk. You may park in a bicycle lane if there is not a "No parking" sign posted and your vehicle does not block a bicyclist.

comment.text: It is illegal to park your vehicle: | It is illegal to park your car on a marked or unmarked crosswalk. You may park in a bicycle lane if there is not a "No parking" sign posted and your vehicle does not block a bicyclist.

hasPart.name: Which of the following statements about blind spots is true?

about.name: Which of the following statements about blind spots is true?

hasPart.assesses: Which of the following statements about blind spots is true? | Which of the following statements about blind spots is true? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Blind spots are areas that a driver cannot see if they look in their mirrors. Large trucks have large blind spots that drivers of other vehicles should avoid.

suggestedAnswer.text: They are eliminated if you have one outside mirror on each side of the vehicle.

comment.text: They are eliminated if you have one outside mirror on each side of the vehicle.

suggestedAnswer.text: Large trucks have bigger blind spots than most passenger vehicles.

comment.text: Large trucks have bigger blind spots than most passenger vehicles.

suggestedAnswer.text: Blind spots can be checked by looking in your rearview mirrors.

comment.text: Blind spots can be checked by looking in your rearview mirrors.

acceptedAnswer.text: Large trucks have bigger blind spots than most passenger vehicles.

comment.text: Large trucks have bigger blind spots than most passenger vehicles.

answerExplanation.text: Blind spots are areas that a driver cannot see if they look in their mirrors. Large trucks have large blind spots that drivers of other vehicles should avoid.

comment.text: Which of the following statements about blind spots is true? | Blind spots are areas that a driver cannot see if they look in their mirrors. Large trucks have large blind spots that drivers of other vehicles should avoid.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: Which of the following statements about blind spots is true? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
educationalAlignment.targetName: Which of the following statements about blind spots is true?

hasPart.name: When you drive through a construction zone, you should:

about.name: When you drive through a construction zone, you should:

hasPart.assesses: When you drive through a construction zone, you should: | When you drive through a construction zone, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: To avoid contributing to chronic traffic congestion, you should not "rubberneck." That is, you should not slow down to look at out-of-the-ordinary things.

comment.text: Stop to watch the workers.
Decrease your following distance.

suggestedAnswer.text: Pass the construction zone carefully and not “rubberneck."

comment.text: Pass the construction zone carefully and not “rubberneck."

acceptedAnswer.text: Pass the construction zone carefully and not “rubberneck."

comment.text: Pass the construction zone carefully and not “rubberneck."

answerExplanation.text: To avoid contributing to chronic traffic congestion, you should not "rubberneck." That is, you should not slow down to look at out-of-the-ordinary things.

comment.text: When you drive through a construction zone, you should: | To avoid contributing to chronic traffic congestion, you should not "rubberneck." That is, you should not slow down to look at out-of-the-ordinary things.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: When you drive through a construction zone, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions

hasPart.name: What should you do at an intersection with a flashing yellow signal light?

about.name: What should you do at an intersection with a flashing yellow signal light?

hasPart.assesses: What should you do at an intersection with a flashing yellow signal light? | What should you do at an intersection with a flashing yellow signal light? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Slow down and be alert before entering the intersection. Yield to any pedestrians, bicyclists, or vehicles in the intersection. You do not need to stop for a flashing yellow traffic signal light.

suggestedAnswer.text: Maintain your speed but watch for other vehicles.

comment.text: Maintain your speed but watch for other vehicles.
Stop before crossing the intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

comment.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

acceptedAnswer.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

comment.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

answerExplanation.text: Slow down and be alert before entering the intersection. Yield to any pedestrians, bicyclists, or vehicles in the intersection. You do not need to stop for a flashing yellow traffic signal light.

comment.text: What should you do at an intersection with a flashing yellow signal light? | Slow down and be alert before entering the intersection. Yield to any pedestrians, bicyclists, or vehicles in the intersection. You do not need to stop for a flashing yellow traffic signal light.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: What should you do at an intersection with a flashing yellow signal light? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
educationalAlignment.targetName: What should you do at an intersection with a flashing yellow signal light?
